settings.html:
<style>
    .active-btn .elementor-button {
        background-color: red;
    }
</style>
<script>
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
        var videoContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".video-player");
        var buttons = document.querySelectorAll("[data-video-src]");

        buttons.forEach(function(button) {
                button.addEventListener("click", function() {
                    
                    var videoName = button.getAttribute("data-video-src");
                    
                    
                    button.classList.add("active-btn");

                    buttons.forEach(function(otherButton) {
                        if (otherButton !== button) {
                            otherButton.classList.remove("active-btn");
                        }
                    });
                
                    videoContainers.forEach(function(container) {
                        container.style.display = (container.id === videoName) ? "block" : "none";
                    });
                });
            });
    });
</script>
